Class RectangleManager

java.lang.Object
  com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.ShapeManager
      com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.RectangleManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
OvalManager
public class RectangleManager
extends ShapeManager

Manages the operations for drawing a rectangle.

Since:
2/05/2004
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei

adjustPoints

private void adjustPoints()
This adjust the top left and bottom left point appropriatley, to allow users to set any point first, instead of just the top left point first.

moveShape

public boolean moveShape(Shape shape,
                         MouseEvent e,
                         int zoomLevel)
Description copied from class: ShapeManager
Move the shape given to where the mouse is. This method is implemented so that it works even when the shape is zoomed in on.

Specified by:
moveShape in class ShapeManager
Parameters:
shape - The shape to move.
e - The mouse event to process and move the shape to.
zoomLevel - The zoom level of the image. 100% = 100
Returns:
If the operation succeeded.
